sub_title: Leadership Development Consultant | Experienced in Professional Services & Sales Leadership | Professional Executive Coach | Certified Mentor Coach ICF
summary:
With over 20 years of proven success in various business leading roles within the corporate world and extensive knowledge of coaching, training, and facilitation methodologies, I am looking for partnering with key business stakeholders to understand and determine appropriate people interventions that support the business objectives, driving increased business performance and employee engagement. 

In my work, I facilitate clients to focus on the right direction and actions, developing leaders and high performing teams, creating, and re-creating the ways of working needed to deliver concrete results.

My area of specialization covers various leadership challenges and transitions, supporting individuals, teams, and organizations to thrive during change and beyond, communicating with impact, achieve a high level of clarity alignment and direction, developing effective teams by increasing motivation and engagement while reducing stress and overwhelm.

If you have similar interests or goals, I am open to a conversation at contact@laurabalaci.com.

profile_positions.description:
I mostly coach leaders and professionals who feel overwhelmed, disorganized, experience low productivity, low morale, and high turnover, facing major transitions and experiencing difficulty in coping with change or feeling stuck so can’t see a way out.  

As a result of our work together you can be more productive, have peace of mind and less stress, make better decisions, increase comfort and confidence leading, increase morale and decrease turnover, you are more grounded and focused on the most important issues, your performance, as well as that of your team and your organization, improves. 

I designed the ‘Rethink your Leadership’ program based on my experience of >20 years in corporate business, >1000 hours of leadership coaching, and >200 trained leaders. That is a 10 months high-performance development program with relevant practical content, coaching, facilitation, and mentoring that translates not only to developing new essential skills but also to serious results at the individual level, team level and organisation
profile_positions.title: Coaching, Mentoring & Facilitation

profile_positions.description: Facilitate and Coach in international projects.
profile_positions.title: Associate Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Designed, customized, and delivered leadership training programs and coaching to help leaders increase their level of confidence, promote resourcefulness in a challenging business environment, approach change flexibly and display agility in complex and uncertain situations, remain calm and resilient when faced with a problem, and be relentless in finding solutions. 

Successfully delivered training programs for more than 200 professionals, from Manufacturing, Banking and IT industries on topics related to Stress Management, Emotional Intelligence, Assertive Communication, Conflict Management, Mindset Shifting, Leadership Embodiment, Mentoring.

Combining my extensive management experience with practical tools from coaching, training and facilitation, I have designed ‘’Manager on Demand’’ – a blended training & coaching leadership program for managers that not only aims to improve the leadership skills but also to produce measurable results and more lasting, relevant improvements rather than short-term gains. 
     
Given my previous experience in sales management and marketing, I have also been asked and I’ve got in response, actively involved in sales, marketing, and business development by attending client meetings, demo services, drafting or reviewing marketing messages, and prioritizing client call out. That led to greater productivity and increased client reach per week.  

I consulted and reviewed the general management system, recommended improvement strategies and operational measures to streamline the current activity, and to grow the business. 

For my previous partner and employee recruitment experience, I have been invited to participate in the recruitment process of new partners, sales representatives, trainers and support staff, bringing my contribution by interviewing, attending demos and making recommendations.
profile_positions.title: Trainer, Coach & Facilitator

profile_positions.description:
Oracle University

Lead the Oracle Education Sales Team for the mass markets in ECEMEA (Eastern & Central Europe, Russia, Middle East, and Africa) towards the achievement of year-over-year revenue growth and business performance goals. 

Effectively managed, hired, trained, and coached a remote team located in 5 different countries across Europe, the Middle East, and Africa. By implementing an effective onboarding process, training on the job, a performance monitoring and evaluation system, employees were able to achieve their goals within the first three months in the role and to take appropriate actions immediately when performance derailed. 

As an extension of my role as Regional Education Sales Manager, I worked closely with the Global Marketing Team to drive digital marketing initiatives and social selling campaigns for the Global Education Sales and Global Business Development teams. I contributed in that regards with campaign new ideas, validation of other ideas, testing new campaigns, collecting and feeding back input from the sales representatives executing the campaigns, followed up on progress and reported monthly on the marketing campaign execution and results. The purpose of that was to increase sales volumes by generating a pool of pre-qualified leads. 

I initiated quarterly call-out initiatives addressed specifically to my team, in addition to the global marketing campaigns to ensure appropriate market coverage and achievement of the targeted business results. 

I built and maintained a strong business relationship with the Regional Sales Leaders by exchanging regularly progress information resulting in better alignment of my team’s actions and resources with the global/regional targets and goals.    

I designed and operated a reliable sales management system that supported consistent accuracy in forecasting the business numbers at the level of individual salesperson, country and region.
profile_positions.title: Regional Education Manager, ECEMEA

profile_positions.description:
Oracle University

Lead the Oracle Education Sales Team for the small and medium-sized markets in South-Eastern Europe (Romania, Croatia, Serbia & Montenegro, Slovenia, Macedonia, Albania, Kosovo, Bulgaria) towards the achievement of year-over-year revenue growth and business performance goals.

Promoted from Education Country Leader to Regional Leader lead by demonstrating leadership potential and organizational awareness. In this role, I have effectively managed, hired, trained, and coached a remote team of field sales representatives located in 5 different countries across SEE.

For two consecutive years, my team achieved double-digit growth in revenue at the regional level, more than 30% growth achieved in Romania. 

I built effective working relationships with more than 15 partners across the region through regular support, business meetings, and reviews, resulting in more than 15% growth in revenue numbers.
profile_positions.title: Regional Education Manager, SEE

profile_positions.description:
Oracle University

As Education Leader for the Romanian market, I was accountable for the Training Centre P&L while leading the Oracle University Education team, to position, sell, and deliver education products and services to accelerate Oracle technology adoption by the Romanian Oracle clients.  
	 
I have been awarded by Oracle Corporation for Leadership Excellence in training quality and customer service as a token of recognition for the business results in the fiscal year 2008:  20% revenue growth and 98% satisfaction and customer repeatability score. 

I recruited and onboarding 5 new partners, growing the indirect channel business by 7%; recruited and onboarding 7 new team members for sales, delivery, and admin functions.

I represented Oracle Education at the Country Managers meetings, providing feedback, ideas, and proposals for better collaboration with the other lines of business for alignment and improvement in the overall country business results.
profile_positions.title: Education Country Leader, Romania

profile_positions.description:
Recruited, Onboarded, and Supported a Franchise type of Partner Network, for better territory coverage and revenue growth. 

I designed a business training curricula, an induction package, and delivered training for 5 Partners' sales force and operational staff.
profile_positions.title: Channel Manager

profile_positions.description:
Developed user education strategy and instructional content for customized and standard SaaS solutions. 

Developed a web-based Support Centre application (including user manuals, on-line help, and video tutorials) to enable customers an easier use of the software.
profile_positions.title: User Education Manager

profile_positions.description:
Coordinated a team of 3 to manage, sold and delivered training for customers of Fujitsu ICL in Romania. 
I have built solutions for complex education projects (>500 users) addressing: training needs analysis, 
training methodology definition, training providers’ selection and supervision, evaluation.
profile_positions.title: Training Center Manager

profile_positions.description:
Lead the ISO 9001 registration process to certification awarded by Lloyds Register Quality Assurance. 
I have produced the first edition of the quality manual and afterward, I continued to undertake regular revisions and perform the internal audits. 

In addition to my work as a coordinator of the quality processes and documentation, I have designed, sold, and delivered a quality management training course aimed at IT companies looking for the ISO certification

I consulted as a paid service another Romanian IT Company which got successfully certified within a year from the start and as a result of our work together.
profile_positions.title: Quality Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Participated in the re-branding project to reposition ICL after merging with Fujitsu by organizing the meetings with the PR agency and acting as a liaison between the Agency, Marketing Manager and General Manager of ICL. 

Successfully organized more than 20 company events (exhibitions, customer events, internal events): arranging the location, catering, client/employee invitations, contracting suppliers for additional services.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Executive

profile_positions.description: Executive Assistant of the Country Leader or the Fujitsu ICL representative office in Romania.
profile_positions.title: Management Assistant to Country General Manager

profile_positions.description: Responsible for organizational activities in relation to business fairs, exhibitions, and marketing materials development.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Executive
